full_text:
** BELLSOUTH ** (BST,A00100)                                  JEFFREY EPSTEIN                 Page 8
Account Number:      561 832-4117 908 0450
Bill Period Date:    Mar 5, 2005  
Messages (continued)
BellSouth Answers plans fit your lifestyle Unlimited Local and Long Distance, International, Cingular Wireless, DIRECTV Service, and High-speed Internet. Now for a limited time you can enjoy greater savings on many of these services and take advantage of the added convenience of getting them all from one place. So bundle today and start saving. Call 1 866 740-9015 or visit bellsouth.com/value for more details.
WANT A FASTER INTERNET? Step up from dial-up with BellSouth FastAccess DSL. You'll get instant connections, plus you can talk and surf on the same phone line. With download speeds much faster than any dial-up service, it's a great choice for fast Web surfing, online shopping, banking, e-mail, downloading photos and much more! Plus, getting started is a breeze. Our user-friendly start-up kit makes installation quick and easy, so you'll be up and running in no time. What's more, you'll get reliable service backed by our knowledgeable, live customer support staff 24/7. You'll be able to talk to a help desk representative anytime-even when you're online. Check out our SPECIAL OFFERS at www.fastaccess.com/faster4 or call 1 877 689-2617. Service not available in all areas.
Visit us on the Internet: www.bellsouth.com
07/26/17                                        Page 19 of 104                  Public Records Request No.: 17-295
DOJ-OGR-00031636

additional_notes: The document appears to be a page from a bill or invoice from BellSouth to Jeffrey Epstein. The page contains promotional information about BellSouth's services. The document has been stamped or annotated with a public records request number and a date (07/26/17). The page numbers (8 and 19) suggest that the document is a multi-page record.
